entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his loud voice. He is described as taking two massive swipes at his attackers and being able to withstand spells.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who gasps in shock when Hagrid starts fighting.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who screams for someone to get Hagrid but her helper is reluctant.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's dog and is described as being draped around his shoulders after he collapses.

relationships.description: Hagrid shouts at Umbridge, calling her cowards.
Hermione is near Hagrid when he starts fighting and gasps in shock.
Umbridge orders her helper to get Hagrid but the helper is reluctant.
Hagrid carries Fang's limp body around his shoulders after he collapses.
